settings.top_announcement_text: Hurry up! Special New Year sale.

settings.content: Our passion is to create and select unusual interior and home decor items.

settings.faq_title: How does the size of the pieces differ for the puzzle sizes – S, M, KS, RS?
settings.faq_text: Our sizes change with the number of pieces, so the size of the pieces is the same in every puzzle.
Our puzzles are made from a pressured HDF that is 3mm thick. This material is eco-friendly, high-quality and durable. It doesn’t deform and doesn’t give splinters (like with plywood).

settings.faq_title: How long does each size puzzle take to assemble?
settings.faq_text:
Check our illustration (link/popup of with an illustration of the sizes and photo of a girl). As well as the size pay attention to the assembly times:

S -> from 2 hours
M-> from 4 hours
L-> from 6 hours
RS -> from 8 hours

The large puzzle will most probably take a couple of evenings to assemble so it is best to complete it on a separate table.

settings.faq_title: Who are the puzzles suitable for?
settings.faq_text:
Wooden puzzles are a great gift for practically anyone.

You can spend an evening assembling the puzzle with your family, children, loved ones.

As well as puzzle lovers, our jigsaws are bought by creative people, board game lovers, people who like to do simple tasks with their hands

settings.faq_title: What do I do with completed puzzles?
settings.faq_text:
Many customers use their puzzle as an alternative to board games: they visit friends or family and complete the puzzle together.

When you’ve completed the assembly process, don’t put the puzzle back in the cupboard. Use it as interior decoration! We have developed a special gluing system for this which fixes the puzzle together and sticks it to the wall.

This is suitable for all sizes, with the help of one set you can fix and hang 8 small puzzles, 4 medium puzzles, or 4 large puzzles.

settings.tax_title: WILL I HAVE TO PAY INTERNATIONAL TAXES & DUTIES?
settings.tax_sub_content:
Your order may be subject to import duties and taxes, which are levied once a shipment reaches your country. The general amount for the duties and taxes fee is about 15 % of the dollar amount of the merchandise. However, this is just a general guideline and may vary depending on the country to which the order was shipped. You should contact your customs office for specific amounts and percentages.

Unidragon cannot control and is not responsible for any duties/taxes applied to your package. You will be responsible for paying additional charges for customs clearance. Customs policies vary widely from country to country; please contact your local customs office for further information. Note, in rare occasions custom agents may delay delivery of some packages.

PLEASE PAY ATTENTION: Due to big dimensions of the package you will pay customs and import taxes. The amount of taxes depends on your country's laws. We are not responsible for them.

settings.section_title: AMAZING PRESENT FOR YOU AND YOUR RELATIVES!

settings.title: EXPRESS FREE SHIPPING!
settings.text:
● USA Shipping takes 3 to 5 days.

● Please note that the delivery time may be longer due to the high demand of our items.
● Shipping times will be affected by holidays. Manufacturers and couriers will limit their operations at this time. Unfortunately, this is beyond our control. Normal service resumes immediately after each holiday ended.

settings.title: GUARANTEE
settings.text: We are fully responsible for the quality of our products! If you receive products of inadequate quality, we promise to return the money within 30 calendar days.

At Unidragon, we sell various types of wooden jigsaw puzzles you can play with during your leisure time. Our wooden unique puzzle is of high quality and it comes with a pretty artwork design which can be enjoyed in places such as reception rooms, coffee tables, office break rooms, waiting rooms, and many other places.

We have various wood puzzles for adults and kids and it is a game that increases your IQ. The Unidragon wooden jigsaw puzzle can also serve as a nice room decoration when you glue and hang it after solving the puzzle. It is quite an interesting game to play given the level of thought you experience while playing it.

Each piece of the Unidragon wooden jigsaw puzzles is laser-cut, uniquely and artfully crafted differently. Thus, this makes the puzzling time more fun-filled and enjoyable. Our unique jigsaw puzzles are made of quality plywood, and it comes in varieties of unique shapes and vivid colors. 

Play the Unidragon wooden puzzles to improve your memory, problem-solving skills, visual-spatial ability, mood, and to lower your stress level. With our wooden jigsaw puzzles, can help in promoting eyes and hand co-ordination and it is one of the best puzzle games on the market.  

At Unidragon, we have different types wooden jigsaw puzzles and they all come in different artwork depictions. We sell different variations of  the jigsaw puzzle game which can be played by adults and kids and we sell at the best price. 

In addition, you can go through our catalog to view all our products. You are sure to find a lot more things that will catch your fancy. At Unidragon, our watchwords are exquisiteness and convenience. We ensure our patrons get nothing but the best in patronizing us.  

BUY YOUR WOODEN JIGSAW PUZZLE NOW!

Unidragon sells the best wooden jigsaw puzzles. All our products are nothing short of quality and we are here to make your free or leisure time worthwhile. 

So, patronize us today. Make your free time fun-filled. Order your jigsaw puzzles online right now!

It is quite an interesting game to play given the level of thought you experience while playing it.

settings.slide_text: It is removable and will not damage your wall.

settings.slide_title: Fix the puzzle to the wall.

settings.section_title: Gluing system, for those who like to decorate their home!
settings.left_text:
Now you can easily turn your puzzle into a piece of interior decor for the home, office, or just about anywhere.

The kit includes:

  • A cardboard base for turning the puzzle over;
  • Special stickers for attaching the base to the table;
  • Adhesive labels for holding the puzzle pieces together (3 sheets);
  • Adhesive patches for attaching the puzzle to the desired surface;
  • Adhesive patches for attaching the puzzle to the desired surface;
  • Instructions.

The fixing system is universal for all puzzles and sizes

settings.faq_title: How does the size of the pieces differ for the puzzle sizes – S, M, KS, RS?
settings.faq_text: Our sizes change with the number of pieces, so the size of the pieces is the same in every puzzle.
Our puzzles are made from a pressured HDF that is 3mm thick. This material is eco-friendly, high-quality and durable. It doesn’t deform and doesn’t give splinters (like with plywood).

settings.faq_title: How long does each size puzzle take to assemble?
settings.faq_text:
Check our illustration (link/popup of with an illustration of the sizes and photo of a girl). As well as the size pay attention to the assembly times:

S -> from 2 hours
M-> from 4 hours
L-> from 6 hours

The large puzzle will most probably take a couple of evenings to assemble so it is best to complete it on a separate table.

settings.faq_title: Who are the puzzles suitable for?
settings.faq_text:
Wooden puzzles are a great gift for practically anyone.

You can assemble them by yourself, getting away from your routine, it is a pleasant and useful exercise as it develops the brain and fine motor skills.

You can spend an evening assembling the puzzle with your family, children, loved ones.

As well as puzzle lovers, our jigsaws are bought by creative people, board game lovers, people who like to do simple tasks with their hands

settings.faq_title: What do I do with completed puzzles?
settings.faq_text:
Many customers use their puzzle as an alternative to board games: they visit friends or family and complete the puzzle together.

Some families even do timed assemblies. You can also make the assembly more difficult by completing it from the other side (it also has a picture on it)!

When you’ve completed the assembly process, don’t put the puzzle back in the cupboard. Use it as interior decoration! We have developed a special gluing system for this which fixes the puzzle together and sticks it to the wall.

This is suitable for all sizes, with the help of one set you can fix and hang 6 small puzzles, 3 medium puzzles, or 3 large puzzles.

settings.header_text: Get inspired following us on Instagram

settings.gift_image_banner_text: Get an extra gift and assemble your 3D dinosaur model

settings.gift_text: A great gift for a child!
settings.number_first_text: Get the whole family together and have a fun time
settings.number_second_text: Develop fine motor skills of hands, logic and thinking
settings.number_third_text: Clean your mind puting together fanciful shapes
settings.number_fourth_text: Learn about animal diversity throughout history
settings.surprise_desc: Get an extra gift and assemble your 3D dinosaur model
settings.mounting_title: Mounting system in each puzzle set
settings.mounting_desc: Fix the assembled puzzle on the wall in the child's room.
settings.dinoframe_title: An outer frame and handy ruler in a set.
settings.habitat_title: Every dinosaur is in its own habitat.
settings.dinopazzle_title: Our puzzles are made of wood.

settings.mandala_title: Mandala is your message to the Universe!
settings.mandala_set_text: Looks like a kaleidoscope that you can spin in your hand.
settings.mandala_box_title: Special design box of round shape complements the unique set.
settings.mandala_feature_text: The sidewall has an "endless" pattern, it has no beginning or end, the pattern is looped.
settings.mandala_figure_second_title: Settle yourself for growth and success
settings.mandala_bottom_title: Turn you desires to come true

settings.video_first_title: Compile colorful jigsaw puzzle of a thousand of pieces
settings.video_first_text: Dragons, gas ballons and animals-like figurines piece by piece add up to Cappadocia illustration
settings.video_second_text: Quezzle is an illustration with detailed drawing, hundreds of stories and characters.
settings.video_third_title: Get through quests and save the Princess
settings.video_third_text: The Elephant, Pegasus, the Eagle and the Lion 3D-figurines come to help — Unidragon Prince`s friends are waiting for you in each Quezzle part
settings.quest_title: Compile the puzzle, get through the quest
settings.quest_first_title: 1000 unique pieces. More interesting than a usual jigsaw puzzle!
settings.quest_third_title: Colorful image with a detailed drawing
settings.quest_sixth_title: Collectors wooden box for your collection
settings.order_set_text: All of 4 parts together open the story line — 12-step quest
settings.feature_first_text: It's so easy to let your eyes linger at the illustration, but it's high time to do the puzzle
settings.feature_second_text: Having extra details left? They are Unidragon's friends
settings.feature_third_text: Don't get lost in Quezzle story-lines!
settings.feature_fourth_text: Take an imaginary walk along the side-streets and fly below the clouds on gas balloons
settings.feature_fifth_title: Lose yourself in going through the main quest
settings.feature_fifth_text: Go through mazes and complete additional tasks
settings.catchy_first_title: Not just a puzzle but a beautiful illustration and a quest game
settings.catchy_first_text: One product — three ways of entertainment. Compile a bright thousand pieces jigsaw puzzle. Look at pieces and find out secrets. Go through quests and mazes.
settings.catchy_first_img_desc: Surprise everybody and let them gather round you at the party
settings.catchy_second_text: A pleasure to look at an illustration with hundreds of plots and characters. There are mummies, ninjas, dinosaurs and even the authors of Quezzle from Unidragon and IC4Design lurking on it!
settings.catchy_second_img_desc: Unforgettable gift for the New Year and Christmas
settings.catchy_third_title: Quezzle is a bright catchy gift
settings.catchy_third_text: In a picture-rich picture, you will need to find encrypted messages in the form of details, objects and words.
settings.catchy_third_img_desc: Good to play together with kids
settings.catchy_fourth_title: Quezzle is a 4-part quest in which you have to rescue a princess from a villain
settings.catchy_fourth_text: The story will be complemented by 40 side quests and 10 labyrinths. Complete them and help the Prince and the people of Cappadocia!
settings.catchy_fourth_img_desc: A reason to gather all the family together
settings.gadgets_first_title: Take your mind of gadgets' screens
settings.gadgets_first_text: Let your eyes have a rest. Your smartphone should be waiting.
settings.gadgets_second_text: Get new impressions and charge of positive emotions
settings.gadgets_third_title: Have a happy time with your family
settings.gadgets_third_text: Quezzle is fascinating for the whole family anf friends! Compile the puzzle and go through the quest together!
settings.gadgets_fourth_text: Quezzle will take you off your daily routine
settings.gadgets_fifth_text: You should do your best to compile Quezzle and go through the quest — not everyone can handle it!
settings.gadgets_sixth_text: And not only motor skills: neurologists consider puzzles to be an excellent way to make your brain work better
settings.last_text: Start learning Cappadocia world right now together with Quezzle!
settings.last_desc: Just go choose your own puzzles set and a fascinating journey is already waiting for you!

settings.mandala_title: Emotional and rational, the Sun and the Moon, heaven and earth, light and darkness come together
settings.mandala_set_title: Royal Size is completed with spinner
settings.mandala_set_text: Looks like a kaleidoscope when viewed through the skylight
settings.mandala_box_title: Immediately gift wrapped. A gift that will surprise and be remembered
settings.mandala_feature_text: Mandala's dark half consists of angulated pieces resembling mechanism parts. The light one is compiled of elements having smooth lines and flowery motives.
settings.mandala_figure_first_title: An instrument to obtain inner balance through two outbreaks combination
settings.mandala_bottom_title: The peculiarity is a possibility of each of the halves' circles — they are interchangeable
